tool_description: Creates rollback procedures and contingency plans for reverting subscription plan modifications if issues arise.

change_scope.description: Scope of changes to plan for: pricing, features, billing_cycle, full_plan

affected_customers.description: Number of customers affected by the changes

implementation_date.description: Date when changes were or will be implemented

rollback_triggers.description: Conditions that would trigger a rollback

backup_available.description: Whether system backups are available for rollback

max_rollback_window_hours.description: Maximum time window for rollback execution

error_messages: Invalid change_scope: Must be one of [pricing, features, billing_cycle, full_plan].
Invalid affected_customers: Must be a positive integer.
Invalid implementation_date: Must be a valid date in ISO 8601 format.
Empty rollback_triggers: Must specify at least one rollback trigger condition.
Invalid max_rollback_window_hours: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 168 (7 days).
usage: Provide change_scope, affected_customers, implementation_date, rollback_triggers array, and backup_available status. Optionally set max_rollback_window_hours for time-sensitive rollbacks.

rollback_steps.description: Sequential steps required for rollback execution

estimated_rollback_time.description: Estimated time in minutes to complete rollback

risk_assessment.description: Risk level of rollback operation: low, medium, high

required_approvals.description: List of required approvals before rollback execution
